author: gstein
msg: Remove quotes around the $apr_config invocation. We don't want to test
the output; we want to test the execution.
Patch by: Blair Zajac <blair@orcaware.com>
From me: redirect the error output for that apr-config invocation.
We're just looking for a status result rather than any good/bad
output. Also, look for apr-config rather than libapr.la (the former is
configured, the latter is built). This allows us to find an APR build
directory post-configure, but pre-build. (and apr-config is really
what we want anyways).

author: brane
msg: * build/win32/build_neon.bat: Use correct case in make target names.
Add some trace output to the script.
* build/win32/neon.dsp: Fix typo in debug build command line.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/include/svn_client.h
(svn_client_diff): Removed 'target', 'start' and 'end' parameters.
Added 'path1', 'revision1', 'path2', and 'revision2' parameters.
* subversion/libsvn_client/diff.c
(svn_client_diff): Prep this function to handle two path/revision
pairs.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/diff-cmd.c
(svn_cl__diff): Update call to svn_client_diff.

author: yoshiki
msg: Fix bad interaction of pool destruction in Svn::Repos and Svn::Fs objects.
* fs.c (svn_ruby_fs_new): Fix documentation.
* repos.c (repos_free): Do not call svn_repos_close.  This blows away repos->fs.
When there's any Svn::Fs objects created by Svn::Repos#fs are left and
Svn::Fs methods are called, it will segfault.  Just rely on pool clean up
functions to do the right thing.
(repos_create): Add reference count to the pool repos is allocated.
(repos_close): Remove call to svn_repos_close.

author: brane
msg: First step of gen-make.py modularizaition:
* build/gen_base.py: Renamed from build/gen-base.py.
Put everything that used to be in main() into a class.
* gan-make.py: Just import gen_base and use the appropriate class from there.
